# TickFixer

This app solves tick accuracy issues with the RuneLite client for macOS. 

## Download
Download the .dmg installer [here](https://github.com/jonathangarelick/tick-fixer-standalone/releases/tag/v1.0.0). Drag the app into your Applications folder for convenient use.

When you start the app, a small icon will appear on your top menu bar, that looks like this:

![](https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/41495718/327199855-1c1e6183-105c-4dfe-a5aa-cb0e6dc79321.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.._SzoFOOLYA25GReG1gAezak2oyly1isJS5MYq3r7EPE)

That's it. You should be good to go. I recommend quitting the app when you are not playing RuneScape, otherwise your router will be pinged for no reason.

Thank you, and if you have any feedback, please file an issue above.

Jonathan
